description.narrative: Snowman Logistics Limited (Snowman or the Company) is a company providing Temperature Controlled Logistics (TCL) solutions. Its primary business lines are: Storage: Snowman provides temperature controlled storage services to a number of industries. It has an aggregate capacity of over 18,000 pallets spread over 16 locations. Transportation: Snowman offers temperature controlled transportation services for both long distance transportation and for regional distribution to individual retail hubs, with its fleet of over 109 reefer vehicles. Consignment Agency: Snowmans offerings under this division include a range of supply chain services from inventory management, order collection etc. As part of this project, Snowman proposes to expand its storage facilities at existing and new locations (Snowman III or the Project.

This repeat investment will have a strong development impact by helping build efficient agriculture supply chain solutions in India. Additionally, the investment will help in (a) building competitiveness as the development of an efficient supply chain will help reduce waste and losses as well as reduce logistics costs, (b) providing an opportunity to local businesses to outsource their distribution functions and lower their distribution and inventory costs. Further, IFC''s repeat investment will provide a strong demonstration effect, signaling IFC''s faith in the TCL sector. This should aid the sector and Company in attracting new private capital in future. Finally, this expansion is expected to create additional jobs.
